alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 9:27PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Winfield. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Hannibal. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.2 feet, Nipper Park begins flooding on the Hannibal riverfront. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue rising to 19.8 feet Friday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Mississippi River Hannibal 17.0 16.2 16.9 17.6 18.2 18.9 19.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
